column3: Latest;Sihanoukville: Preah Sihanouk Province: Major General Chuon Narin
column4: Police Commissioner of Preah Sihanouk Province
column5: said that at around 3 am on October 5
column7: police retrieved two AK rifles and 11 rounds of live amunition that had been dumped in a blanket.------The weapons were found in Village 3
column10: and were taken away for further investigation. They are currently being kept at the Sihanoukville Provincial Police Criminal Investigation Office. KPSBN
